original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa

original: Dhammapaccanīyānuloma (4), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4)
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: 22.1. Kusalattika, Hetuduka
analyzed: kusalattika hetu duka

original: Namo tassa Bhagavato Arahato Sammāsambuddhassa.
analyzed: namaḥ tassa bhagavataḥ arahataḥ sammāsambuddhassa

original: Nakusalaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nakusalaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na kusalam na hetum dhammam paṭicca akusalaḥ hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā na kusalam na hetum dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Naakusalaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naakusalaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na akusalam na hetum dhammam paṭicca kusalaḥ hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā na akusalam na hetum dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Naabyākataṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naabyākataṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na abyākatam na hetum dhammam paṭicca kusalaḥ hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā na abyākatam na hetum dhammam paṭicca akusalaḥ hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nakusalaṁ nahetuñca naabyākataṁ nahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo hetu dhammo uppajjati
analyzed: na kusalam na hetum ca na abyākatam na hetuñca dhammam paṭicca akusalaḥ hetu dhammo uppajjati

original: hetupaccayā. Naakusalaṁ nahetuñca naabyākataṁ nahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo hetu
analyzed: hetu paccayā na akusalam na hetuñca na abyākatam na hetuñca dhammam paṭicca kusalaḥ hetu

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nakusalaṁ nahetuñca naakusalaṁ nahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na kusalam na hetuñca na akusalam na hetuñca dhammam paṭicca

original: abyākato hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: abyākataḥ hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: hetuyāḥ nava pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate nava

original: Nakusalaṁ nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na kusalam na na hetum dhammam paṭicca akusalaḥ na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nakusalaṁ nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na kusalam na na hetum dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nakusalaṁ nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo nahetu ca abyākato nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: na kusalam na na hetum dhammam paṭicca akusalaḥ na hetu ca abyākataḥ na hetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Naakusalaṁ nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na akusalam na na hetum dhammam paṭicca kusalaḥ na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Naakusalaṁ nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na akusalam na na hetum dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Naakusalaṁ nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo nahetu ca abyākato nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: na akusalam na na hetum dhammam paṭicca kusalaḥ na hetu ca abyākataḥ na hetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Naabyākataṁ nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pañca.
analyzed: na abyākatam na na hetum dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā pañca

original: Nakusalaṁ nanahetuñca naabyākataṁ nanahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: na kusalam na na hetum ca na abyākatam na na hetuñca dhammam paṭicca akusalaḥ na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Naakusalaṁ nanahetuñca naabyākataṁ nanahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: na akusalam na na hetum ca na abyākatam na na hetuñca dhammam paṭicca kusalaḥ na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Nakusalaṁ nanahetuñca naakusalaṁ nanahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na kusalam na na hetuñca na akusalam na na hetuñca dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ na hetu dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā eka

original: Hetuyā aṭṭhārasa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate aṭṭhārasa.
analyzed: hetuyā aṭṭhārasa ārammaṇe nava pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate aṭṭhārasa
